page.title: 15A SURVEY
page.content: A survey was carried out in Bisley by means of a questionaire which was enclosed in every household'sfree copy of the Bisley News. Forty replies were received. From them we discovered that the majority of people who live in Bisley work outside the village and travel to work by car. Also that most people do the most of their shopping in the large towns nearby. Leisure time activities are very varied and include sailing, horse- riding, shooting,badminton,photography threatre visits, choral music, wine making, cycling, walking, gardening, bellringing, painting, rugby, fishing, squash, swimming and craftwork.Several of the people who returned the questionaire can trace their families back in Bisley for several generations The most is five generations all of whom went to the village school.
